Behavior/Tooltip/AmorphousArmorcloud: Incoming damage from air units reduced by <d ref="Behavior,AmorphousArmorcloud,DamageResponse.ModifyFraction*100" precision="1"/>%.
Behavior/Tooltip/BatteryOvercharge: Restoration rate increased. Not consuming energy.
Behavior/Tooltip/ChronoBoostEnergyCost: This structure is in an accelerated state.
Behavior/Tooltip/FungalGrowth: Target is affected by Fungal Growth. Target is detected and has restricted movement.
Behavior/Tooltip/InfestorEnsnare: This unit is grounded and weapons are disabled.
Behavior/Tooltip/MedivacSpeedBoost: This unit's movement speed is increased.
Behavior/Tooltip/NeuralParasiteChildren: This unit is being controlled by an Infestor.
Behavior/Tooltip/NexusShieldRechargeOnPy: This Pylon restores shields of friendly units nearby.
Behavior/Tooltip/PurificationNovaPost: This unit is invulnerable and is able to move through other units.
Behavior/Tooltip/Purify: This Pylon has a powerful long-ranged attack.
Behavior/Tooltip/RavenShredderMissileTin: This unit is being targeted by an Anti-Armor Missile.
Behavior/Tooltip/TemporalField: This unit's attack and movement speeds are reduced by 50%.
Button/Tooltip/ActivateStasisWard: Traps nearby enemies in stasis for <d ref="Behavior,OracleStasisTrapTarget,Duration"/> seconds. Trapped units cannot be attacked or affected by abilities.
Button/Tooltip/AdeptPiercingUpgrade: Increases the attack speed of Adepts by 45%.
Button/Tooltip/AdeptResearchPiercingUpgr: Increases the attack speed of <c val="ffff8a">Adepts</c> by 45%.
Button/Tooltip/AmorphousArmorcloud: Creates a shroud that obscures ground units underneath, reducing damage taken from air units by <d ref="Behavior,AmorphousArmorcloud,DamageResponse.ModifyFraction*100" precision="1"/>%. Lasts <d ref="Effect,AmorphousArmorcloudCP,PeriodCount*Effect,AmorphousArmorcloudCP,PeriodicPeriodArray[0]"/> seconds.
Button/Tooltip/Armory: Contains weapon and armor upgrades for Factory and Starport units. <n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Enables:</c><n/>- Hellbat at the Factory<n/>- Thor at the Factory
Button/Tooltip/Barracks: Infantry-production facility.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Enables:</c><n/>- Marines<n/>- Reapers<n/>- Bunkers from SCVs<n/>- Orbital Commands from Command Centers
Button/Tooltip/BatteryOvercharge: Overcharges a target Shield Battery near a Nexus, increasing its shield restoration rate by 100% and allowing it to restore shields without consuming energy for <d ref="Behavior,BatteryOvercharge,Duration"/> seconds.
Button/Tooltip/BuildTechLabFactory: Vehicle-research structure. A Tech Lab can fit onto any production structure.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Enables:</c><n/>- Cyclones<n/>- Siege Tanks<n/>- Thor with Armory
Button/Tooltip/BypassArmorDrone: Focuses a beam on enemy units and reduces their armor by 3.<n/>Times out after <d ref="Behavior,BypassArmorDroneTimedLife,Duration"/> seconds.
Button/Tooltip/CalldownMULE: Drops an experimental robotic MULE miner onto the target Mineral Field. MULEs collect minerals more quickly than SCVs.  <n/><n/>MULEs last <d ref="Behavior,MULETimedLife,Duration"/> seconds before their systems fail.
Button/Tooltip/CarrierCapacity: Increases the maximum number of Interceptors per Carrier from 8 to 10.
Button/Tooltip/CarrierLeashRangeUpgrade: Increases the <c val="ffff8a">Interceptor's</c> leash range by <d ref="$UpgradeEffectArrayValue:CarrierLeashRangeUpgrade:Abil,CarrierHangar,Leash$"/>.
Button/Tooltip/Charge: Allows Zealots to intercept nearby enemies. Also increases the movement speed of Zealots. Ability can only be used once every <d ref="Abil,Charge,Cost.Cooldown.TimeUse"/> seconds.
Button/Tooltip/ChronoBoostEnergyCost: Places target structure in a Chrono Boost, causing it to operate <d ref="(((Behavior,ChronoBoostEnergyCost,Modification.RateMultiplierArray[Progress])-1)*100)" precision="1"/>% faster for <d ref="Behavior,ChronoBoostEnergyCost,Duration"/> seconds.
Button/Tooltip/CollapsiblePurifierTowerD: A barrier that can be destroyed to allow access to new areas.
A tower that can be destroyed to prevent access to new areas or resource locations.
Button/Tooltip/CyberneticsCore: Contains weapon and armor upgrades for Protoss air units and the Warp Gate upgrade.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Enables:</c><n/>- Sentries at the Gateway<n/>- Stalkers at the Gateway<n/>- Adepts at the Gateway<n/>- Shield Batteries from Probes
Button/Tooltip/Cyclone: Mobile assault vehicle. Can use Lock On to quickly fire while moving.<n/><n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Can attack ground units.</c>
Button/Tooltip/CycloneLockOnAir: Allows the Cyclone's weapon and Lock On ability to target air units.
Button/Tooltip/CycloneRapidFireLaunchers: Improves the Lock On ability to fire the first 12 shots quickly.
Button/Tooltip/CycloneResearchLockOnAir: Allows the Cyclone's Typhoon Missile Pods and Lock On ability to target air units.
Button/Tooltip/CycloneResearchLockOnDama: Increases <c val="ffff8a">Cyclone</c> Lock On damage. Deals 400 damage (+400 vs. Armored) over <d ref="Effect,LockOnCP,PeriodCount * Effect,LockOnCP,PeriodicPeriodArray[0]"/> seconds to ground and flying targets.
Button/Tooltip/CycloneUpgrade: Mobile assault vehicle. Can use Lock On to quickly fire while moving.<n/><n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Can attack ground and air units.</c>
Button/Tooltip/DarkShrine: Contains an upgrade for Dark Templar.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Enables:</c><n/>- Dark Templar at the Gateway<n/>- Archon Merge from Dark Templar
Button/Tooltip/DarkTemplarBlink: Teleports the Dark Templar to a nearby target location. Ability can only be used once every <d ref="Abil,DarkTemplarBlink,Cost[0].Cooldown.TimeUse"/> seconds.
Button/Tooltip/Disruptor: Robotic disruption unit. Can use Purification Nova to deal heavy area damage.
Button/Tooltip/DisruptorPhased: Highly concentrated solar energy. Explodes after <d ref="Behavior,PurificationNovaTargettedTarget,Duration"/> seconds, dealing area damage.
Button/Tooltip/EnhancedShockwaves: Increases the radius of <c val="ffff8a">Ghost's</c> EMP Round by +<d ref="$UpgradeEffectArrayValue:EnhancedShockwaves:Effect,EMPSearch,AreaArray[0].Radius$" precision="1"/>.
Button/Tooltip/EvolveAmorphousArmorcloud: Allows <c val="ffff8a">Infestors</c> to use the Microbial Shroud ability.
Button/Tooltip/EvolveAnabolicSynthesis2: Increases the movement speed of <c val="ffff8a">Ultralisks</c> off creep.
Button/Tooltip/EvolveCentrificalHooks: <c val="ffff8a">Banelings</c> gain increased movement speed and +5 life.
Button/Tooltip/EvolveDiggingClaws: Reduces the time <c val="ffff8a">Lurkers</c> take to burrow from <d time="2.5" precision="1"/> to 1.07 seconds and increases their movement speed.
Button/Tooltip/EvolveMuscularAugments: Increases the movement speed of <c val="ffff8a">Hydralisks</c>.
Button/Tooltip/EvolvePropulsivePeristals: Increase the <c val="ffff8a">Nydus Network</c> and <c val="ffff8a">Nydus Worm's</c> load and unload speeds.
Button/Tooltip/EvolveTunnelingClaws: Enables <c val="ffff8a">Roaches</c> to move while burrowed.
Button/Tooltip/ExplosiveShrapnelShells: Increases the damage of Raven Auto-Turrets and Seeker Missiles by 30%.
Button/Tooltip/Factory: Vehicle-production facility. <n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Enables:</c><n/>- Hellions<n/>- Widow Mines<n/>- Cyclones
Button/Tooltip/Feedback: Drains all energy from the target. Deals <d ref="(Effect,Feedback,VitalFractionCurrent[Energy])" Precision="2"/> damage per point of energy.
Button/Tooltip/FleetBeacon: Contains upgrades for Phoenixes and Void Rays.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Enables:</c><n/>- Tempests at the Stargate</n>- Carriers at the Stargate<n/>- Mothership from the Nexus
Button/Tooltip/Frenzied: Immune to snare, stun, mind control, and movement altering effects.
Button/Tooltip/FungalGrowth: Target units take <d ref="(Behavior,FungalGrowth,Duration / Behavior,FungalGrowth,Period) * Effect,FungalGrowthDamage,Amount"/> damage over <d time="4"/> and have movement speed reduced by <d ref="(1-Behavior,FungalGrowthSlowMovement,Modification.MoveSpeedMultiplier)*100"/>%. Reveals cloaked and burrowed units. Affected units cannot Blink or load into transports or buildings.
Button/Tooltip/FusionCore: Contains Medivac, Liberator, and Battlecruiser upgrades. <n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Enables:</c><n/>- Battlecruisers at the Starport
Button/Tooltip/Ghost: Sniper. Can use Steady Targeting, EMP Round, and be upgraded to use Cloak. Can call down Tactical Nukes built at the Ghost Academy.<n/><n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Can attack ground and air units.</c>
Button/Tooltip/GhostAcademy: Contains upgrades for Ghosts. Can build Nukes for Ghosts.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Enables:</c><n/>- Ghosts at the Barracks
Button/Tooltip/GuardianShield: Creates a range <d ref="Effect,GuardianShieldSearch,AreaArray[0].Radius" precision="1"/> aura that reduces incoming ranged damage to friendly units by 2. Lasts <d time="15"/>.
Button/Tooltip/Heal: Heals a friendly biological target.<n/><n/><c val="f078ff">Heals <d ref="Effect,MedivacHeal,RechargeVitalRate*Effect,MedivacHeal,DrainVitalCostFactor"/> life per 1 energy.</c>
Button/Tooltip/HighCapacityFuelTanks: Increases the Medivac's fuel reserves, allowing Ignite Afterburners to last 50% longer.
Button/Tooltip/HighTemplar: Potent psionic master. Can use Feedback and be upgraded to use Psionic Storm. Can transform into an Archon.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Can attack ground units.</c>
Button/Tooltip/HydraliskDen: Contains upgrades for Hydralisks.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Enables:</c><n/>- Hydralisks from Larvae
Button/Tooltip/ImmortalOverload: Absorbs up to <d ref="Behavior,ImmortalOverload,DamageResponse.ModifyLimit"/> damage. Lasts for <d ref="Behavior,ImmortalOverload,Duration"/> seconds. This effect can only occur once every <d ref="Abil,ImmortalOverload,Cost[0].Cooldown.TimeUse"/> seconds.
Button/Tooltip/InfestationPit: Contains upgrades for Infestors.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Enables:</c><n/>- Infestors from Larvae<n/>- Swarm Hosts from Larvae
Button/Tooltip/InfestedTerrans: Spawn an Infested Terran. Infested Terrans last <d ref="Behavior,InfestedTerranTimedLife,Duration"/> seconds.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Can cast while burrowed.</c>
Button/Tooltip/Infestor: Infestation specialist. Can use the Fungal Growth, Microbial Shroud, and Neural Parasite abilities.
Button/Tooltip/InfestorEnsnare: Brings a target air unit to the ground for <d ref="Behavior,InfestorEnsnare,Duration"/> seconds, rendering it unable to attack, and allowing units to attack it as if it were a ground unit.
Button/Tooltip/KD8Charge: Explodes after a short delay, dealing <d ref="Effect,KD8ChargeExplodeDamage,Amount"/> damage and knocking back nearby units.
Button/Tooltip/LiberatorAGRangeUpgrade: Increases the range of Liberators in Defender Mode by <d ref="$UpgradeEffectArrayValue:LiberatorAGRangeUpgrade:Weapon,LiberatorAGWeapon,Range$"/>.
Button/Tooltip/LockOn: Locks the Cyclone's weapons on the target unit, dealing <d ref="Effect,LockOnCP,PeriodCount*Effect,CycloneWeaponDamage,Amount"/> damage over <d ref="Effect,LockOnCP,PeriodCount * Effect,LockOnCP,PeriodicPeriodArray[0]"/> seconds to ground and flying targets. Can move while firing. Cancels if target moves out of range.

Button/Tooltip/LockOnUpgraded: Locks the Cyclone's weapons on the target unit, dealing <d ref="Effect,LockOnCP,PeriodCount*Effect,CycloneWeaponDamage,Amount"/> damage (+400 vs. Armored) over <d ref="Effect,LockOnCP,PeriodCount * Effect,LockOnCP,PeriodicPeriodArray[0]"/> seconds to ground and flying targets. Can move while firing. Cancels if target moves out of range.
Button/Tooltip/LurkerDenMP: Contains an upgrade for Lurkers.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Enables:</c><n/>- Lurkers from Hydralisks
Button/Tooltip/MULE: Prototype harvesting unit. Gathers minerals more quickly than regular SCVs. MULEs last <d time="90"/> before their systems fail.
Button/Tooltip/MassRecall: Recalls all player units in the target area to the Mothership.
Button/Tooltip/MedivacSpeedBoost: Increases the Medivac's movement speed for <d ref="Behavior,MedivacSpeedBoost,Duration"/> seconds.
Button/Tooltip/MorphMorphalisk: Target Hatchery, Lair, or Hive spawns <d ref="Effect,SpawnMutantLarvaApplySpawnBehavior,Count"/> Larvae in <d ref="Behavior,QueenSpawnLarvaTimer,Duration"/> seconds. If Hatchery, Lair, or Hive has more than 3 Larvae at one time, regular Larva production will stop until there are fewer than 3 Larvae. This will stack and queue if the target is already spawning additional Larva.
Button/Tooltip/MorphToMothership: Upgrades into the Mothership. Can use Photon Overcharge, Mass Recall and Time Warp. Cloaks nearby units and structures.
Button/Tooltip/MorphtoObserver: Transforms the Observer to standard Observer Mode. Allows the Observer to move at the cost of decreased sight radius.
Button/Tooltip/MorphtoObserverSiege: Transforms the Observer to Surveillance Mode. The Observer gains <d ref="(Unit,ObserverSiegeMode,Sight/Unit,Observer,Sight-1)*100"/>% wider vision, but loses the ability to move.
Button/Tooltip/MorphtoOverlordTransport: Enables the Overlord to transport units.
Button/Tooltip/MorphtoOverseerNormal: Restores the Overseer's ability to move and returns its vision to its normal radius.
Button/Tooltip/MorphtoOverseerSiege: Grants the Overseer <d ref="(Unit,OverseerSiegeMode,Sight/Unit,Overseer,Sight-1)*100"/>% wider vision, but removes its ability to move. This ability can be canceled after activation.
Button/Tooltip/Mothership: Ultimate Protoss vessel. Can use Strategic Recall and Time Warp abilities. Cloaks nearby friendly units and structures.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Can attack ground and air units.</c>
Button/Tooltip/MothershipCoreWeapon: Energizes the target Pylon's khaydarin crystal, turning it into a powerful long-range weapon for <d ref="Behavior,Purify,Duration[0]"/> seconds that deals <d ref="Effect,MothershipCoreWeaponDamage,Amount[0]"/> damage.
Button/Tooltip/MutateintoLurkerDen: Contains an upgrade for Lurkers.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Enables:</c><n/>- Lurkers from Hydralisks
Button/Tooltip/NeuralParasite: Target unit is controlled by the Infestor for <d ref="Behavior,NeuralParasite,Duration"/> seconds. The Infestor cannot take any other action while controlling an enemy unit.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Channeled ability. Can cast while burrowed.</c><n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Heroic units are immune.</c>
Button/Tooltip/Nexus: Primary structure. Can receive gathered resources. Can use the Chrono Boost and Mass Recall abilities.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Enables:</c><n/>- Probes<n/>- Mothership
Button/Tooltip/NexusMassRecall: Recalls all units owned by the player in the target area to the Nexus.
Button/Tooltip/NexusShieldOvercharge: Nexus will automatically use energy to restore shields of nearby units.
Button/Tooltip/NexusShieldOverchargeOff: Nexus will no longer automatically target friendly units.
Button/Tooltip/NexusShieldRecharge: Restore shields of target unit or structure.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Costs 1 energy for every <d ref="Effect,NexusShieldRechargeShield,VitalArray[Shields].Change"/> shields restored.</c>
Button/Tooltip/NexusShieldRechargeOnPylo: Energizes the target Pylon's khaydarin crystal, turning it into a structure that restores shields of friendly units for <d ref="Behavior,NexusShieldRechargeOnPylonBehavior,Duration[0]"/> seconds.
Button/Tooltip/NydusWormIncreasedArmorPa: Nydus Worms have <d ref="Behavior,NydusWormArmor,Modification.LifeArmorBonus+1"/> armor when emerging from the ground.
Button/Tooltip/OracleBuildStasisTrap: Places a cloaked Stasis Ward at the target location that lasts <d ref="Behavior,StasisWardTimedLife,Duration"/> seconds. Once activated by an enemy ground unit, the ward traps nearby enemies in stasis for <d ref="Behavior,OracleStasisTrapTarget,Duration"/> seconds. Trapped units cannot be attacked or affected by abilities.
Button/Tooltip/Overseer: Advanced aerial observer. Maintains the unit cap set by the Overlord. Can use the Oversight, Spawn Changeling, and Contaminate abilities.<n/><n/><c val="FFE303">Detector</c>
Button/Tooltip/ParasiticBomb: Creates a parasitic cloud that deals <d ref="Behavior,ParasiticBomb,Duration/Behavior,ParasiticBomb,Period*Effect,ParasiticBombDotDamage,Amount"/> damage over <d ref="Behavior,ParasiticBomb,Duration"/> seconds to the target and enemy air units nearby. If the target dies, the cloud remains in the air where the enemy died until it expires.<n/><n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Cannot target ground units or structures.</c>
Button/Tooltip/PointDefense: Automated defensive laser that intercepts a variety of enemy projectiles. Does not intercept special attacks.<n/><n/><c val="f078ff">Each shot consumes 10 energy.</c>
Button/Tooltip/PsionicSurge: Improves the Zealot's Charge to deal <d ref="Effect,ChargingDamage,Amount"/> damage to the charged target.
Button/Tooltip/PurificationNova: Shoots out a ball of energy that lasts <d ref="Behavior,PurificationNovaTargettedTarget,Duration"/> seconds and emits a powerful nova dealing <d ref="Effect,PurificationNovaDamage,Amount"/> splash damage and an additional <d ref="Effect,PurificationNovaDamage,ShieldBonus"/> shield damage to nearby ground units and structures. The Disruptor is immobile while this is active.
Button/Tooltip/RapidReignitionSystem: Reduces the cooldown of Medivac's Ignite Afterburners by <d time="[d ref='$UpgradeEffectArrayValue:MedivacIncreaseSpeedBoost:Abil,MedivacSpeedBoost,Cost[0].Cooldown.TimeUse$'/]"/> and increases the movement speed of Medivacs.
Button/Tooltip/Raven: Aerial support unit. Can use Auto-Turret, Interference Matrix, and Anti-Armor Missile.<n/><n/><c val="FFE303">Detector</c>
Button/Tooltip/RavenEnhancedMunitionsPas: Increases the Raven's Anti-Armor Missile explosion radius by 20% and its tracking range by 50%.
Button/Tooltip/RavenRecalibratedExplosiv: Increases the Seeker Missile's damage by 30% and its tracking range by 50%.
Button/Tooltip/RavenRepairDrone: Repairs nearby friendly mechanical units for <d ref="Behavior,RavenRepairDroneTimedLife,Duration"/> seconds.
Button/Tooltip/RavenRepairDroneHeal: Repair a friendly mechanical target.<n/><n/><c val="f078ff">Repairs <d ref="Effect,RavenRepairDroneHeal,RechargeVitalRate*Effect,RavenRepairDroneHeal,DrainVitalCostFactor"/> life per 1 energy.</c>
Button/Tooltip/RavenResearchEnhancedMuni: Increases the <c val="ffff8a">Raven's</c> Anti-Armor Missile explosion radius by 20% and its tracking range by 50%.
Button/Tooltip/RavenScramblerMissile: Disables a target unit rendering it unable to attack or use abilities for <d ref="Behavior,RavenScramblerMissile,Duration"/> seconds. Reveals Cloaked units.<n/><n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Can target mechanical and psionic units.</c>
Button/Tooltip/RavenShredderMissile: Deploys a missile which pursues the target unit and, upon contact, reduces the armor and shield armor of affected units by <d ref="Behavior,RavenShredderMissileArmorReduction,DamageResponse.ModifyAmount"/> for <d ref="Behavior,RavenShredderMissileArmorReduction,Duration"/> seconds.
Button/Tooltip/ResearchArmorPiercingRock: Improves the <c val="ffff8a">Cyclone's</c> Lock On ability to deal +<d ref="$UpgradeEffectArrayValue:ArmorPiercingRockets:Effect,CycloneAirWeaponDamageAlternative,AttributeBonus[Armored]$"/> damage vs. armored units per shot. +<d ref="$UpgradeEffectArrayValue:ArmorPiercingRockets:Effect,CycloneAirWeaponDamageAlternative,AttributeBonus[Armored]$*Effect,LockOnAirCP,PeriodCount"/> damage total.
Button/Tooltip/ResearchBallisticRange: Increases the range of <c val="ffff8a">Liberators</c> in Defender Mode by <d ref="$UpgradeEffectArrayValue:LiberatorAGRangeUpgrade:Weapon,LiberatorAGWeapon,Range$"/>.
Button/Tooltip/ResearchCarrierCapacity: Increases the maximum number of Interceptors per <c val="ffff8a">Carrier</c> from 8 to 10.
Button/Tooltip/ResearchCarrierLeashRange: Increases the <c val="ffff8a">Interceptor's</c> leash range by <d ref="$UpgradeEffectArrayValue:CarrierLeashRangeUpgrade:Abil,CarrierHangar,Leash$"/>.
Button/Tooltip/ResearchCharge: Allows <c val="ffff8a">Zealots</c> to intercept nearby enemies. Also increases the movement speed of <c val="ffff8a">Zealots</c>. Ability can only be used once every <d ref="Abil,Charge,Cost.Cooldown.TimeUse"/> seconds.
Button/Tooltip/ResearchCycloneRapidFireL: Increases the attack speed of the first 12 shots of the <c val="ffff8a">Cyclone's</c> Lock On.
Button/Tooltip/ResearchDarkTemplarBlink: Allows <c val="ffff8a">Dark Templars</c> to teleport to a nearby target location.
Button/Tooltip/ResearchDrillClaws: Allows <c val="ffff8a">Widow Mines</c> to burrow and activate three times as fast.
Button/Tooltip/ResearchEnhancedShockwave: Increases the <c val="ffff8a">Ghost's</c> EMP Round radius by +<d ref="$UpgradeEffectArrayValue:EnhancedShockwaves:Effect,EMPSearch,AreaArray[0].Radius$" precision="1"/>.
Button/Tooltip/ResearchExplosiveShrapnel: Increases the damage of Raven <c val="ffff8a">Auto-Turrets</c> and <c val="ffff8a">Seeker Missiles</c> by 30%.
Button/Tooltip/ResearchExtendedThermalLa: Increases the range of the <c val="ffff8a">Colossus</c> weapon by <d ref="$UpgradeEffectArrayValue:ExtendedThermalLance:Weapon,ThermalLances,Range$"/>.
Button/Tooltip/ResearchHiSecAutoTracking: Adds +1 range to <c val="ffff8a">Missile Turrets</c>, <c val="ffff8a">Auto-Turrets</c>, and <c val="ffff8a">Planetary Fortresses</c>.
Button/Tooltip/ResearchHighCapacityBarre: Improves the <c val="ffff8a">Hellion's</c> Infernal Flamethrower to deal +5 damage vs. light units and the <c val="ffff8a">Hellbat's</c> Napalm Spray to deal +12 damage vs. light units.
Button/Tooltip/ResearchHighCapacityFuelT: Increases the <c val="ffff8a">Medivac's</c> fuel reserves, allowing Ignite Afterburners to last 50% longer.
Button/Tooltip/ResearchLockOnRangeUpgrad: Increases Cyclone Lock On range from 6 to 9 and Locked On range from 12 to 15.
Button/Tooltip/ResearchLurkerRange: Increases the attack range of <c val="ffff8a">Lurkers</c> by +<d ref="$UpgradeEffectArrayValue:LurkerRange:Weapon,LurkerMP,Range$"/>.
Button/Tooltip/ResearchPsionicSurge: Improves the <c val="ffff8a">Zealot's</c> Charge to deal <d ref="Effect,ChargingDamage,Amount"/> damage to the charged target.
Button/Tooltip/ResearchRapidReignitionSy: Reduces the cooldown of <c val="ffff8a">Medivac's</c> Ignite Afterburners by <d time="[d ref='$UpgradeEffectArrayValue:MedivacIncreaseSpeedBoost:Abil,MedivacSpeedBoost,Cost[0].Cooldown.TimeUse$'/]"/> and increases the movement speed of <c val="ffff8a">Medivacs</c>.
Button/Tooltip/ResearchRavenRecalibrated: Increases the <c val="ffff8a">Seeker Missile's</c> damage by 30% and its tracking range by 50%.
Button/Tooltip/ResearchSmartServos: Allows <c val="ffff8a">Hellions</c>, <c val="ffff8a">Hellbats</c>, <c val="ffff8a">Vikings</c>, and <c val="ffff8a">Thors</c> to transform quickly between combat modes.
Button/Tooltip/RoachWarren: Contains upgrades for Roaches.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Enables:</c><n/>- Roaches from Larvae<n/>- Ravagers from Roaches
Button/Tooltip/ShieldBatteryRecharge: Restores target unit or structure's shields.
Button/Tooltip/ShieldBatteryRechargeEx5: Restores target unit or structure's shields.<n/><n/><c val="f078ff">Restores 3 shields per 1 energy.</c><n/><n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Autocasting targets units and defensive structures only.</c>
Button/Tooltip/ShieldBatteryRechargeNotO: <n/><n/><c val="f078ff">Restores up to 72 shields per second.</c>
<n/><n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Autocasting targets units and defensive structures only.</c>
Button/Tooltip/ShieldBatteryRechargeOver: <n/><n/><c val="f078ff">Restores up to 36 shields per second. Every 3 shields restored drains 1 energy from the Battery.</c>
Button/Tooltip/Starport: Air-unit production facility. <n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Enables:</c><n/>- Vikings<n/>- Medivacs<n/>- Liberators
Button/Tooltip/SwarmHostMP: Siege unit that attacks by spawning Locust minions.<n/><n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Locusts can attack ground units.</c>
Button/Tooltip/TechLabFactory: Vehicle-research structure. A Tech Lab can fit onto any production structure.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Enables:</c><n/>- Cyclones<n/>- Siege Tanks<n/>- Thor with Armory
Button/Tooltip/Tempest: Siege artillery craft. Attacks from long range.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Can attack ground and air units.</c>
Button/Tooltip/TempestDisruptionBlast: Charges up for <d ref="Abil,TempestDisruptionBlast,CastIntroTime[0]"/> seconds, and then stuns enemy ground units and ground structures in the target area for <d ref="Behavior,TempestDisruptionBlastStunBehavior,Duration"/> seconds.
Button/Tooltip/TempestDisruptionSphereMi: Deals damage for <d ref="(Effect,TempestDeathBallCP,PeriodCount)*(Effect,TempestDeathBallCP,PeriodicPeriodArray[0])"/> seconds, causing up to <d ref="(Effect,TempestDeathBallCP,PeriodCount)*(Effect,TempestDeathBallCP,PeriodicPeriodArray[0])/(Behavior,TempestDeathBall,Period)*(Effect,TempestDeathBallDamage,Amount)"/> damage to enemy ground units and structures in the target area.
Button/Tooltip/TempestGroundAttackUpgrad: Improves the Tempest's Resonance Coil to deal +<d ref="$UpgradeEffectArrayValue:TempestGroundAttackUpgrade:Effect,TempestDamageGround,AttributeBonus[Structure]$"/> damage vs structures.
Button/Tooltip/TempestResearchGroundAtta: Improves the <c val="ffff8a">Tempest's</c> Resonance Coil to deal +<d ref="$UpgradeEffectArrayValue:TempestGroundAttackUpgrade:Effect,TempestDamageGround,AttributeBonus[Structure]$"/> damage vs structures.
Button/Tooltip/TemporalField: After a <d ref="(Effect,TemporalFieldGrowingBubbleCreatePersistent,PeriodCount*Effect,TemporalFieldGrowingBubbleCreatePersistent,PeriodicPeriodArray[0])"/> second delay, warps spacetime within the target area for <d ref="Effect,TemporalFieldAfterBubbleCreatePersistent,PeriodCount*Effect,TemporalFieldAfterBubbleCreatePersistent,PeriodicPeriodArray[0]"/> seconds. All enemy units and structures within the field will have attack and movement speeds reduced by <d ref="(1-Behavior,TemporalField,Modification.MoveSpeedMultiplier)*100"/>%.
Button/Tooltip/TimeWarp: Places target structure in a Chrono Boost, causing it to operate <d ref="(((Behavior,TimeWarpProduction,Modification.TimeScale)-1)*100)" precision="1"/>% faster.
Button/Tooltip/Transfusion: Instantly heals target biological unit or structure for <d ref="Effect,Transfusion,VitalArray[Life].Change"/> life. An additional <d ref="Behavior,Transfusion,Duration/Behavior,Transfusion,Period*Effect,TransfusionHealTick,VitalArray[Life].Change"  precision="3"/> life regenerates over <d ref="Behavior,Transfusion,Duration"/> seconds.
Button/Tooltip/UltraliskCavern: Contains upgrades for Ultralisks.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Enables:</c><n/>- Ultralisks from Larvae
Button/Tooltip/UpgradeBuildingArmorLevel: Upgrades the armor of <c val="ffff8a">structures</c> by 2. Increases the cargo space of <c val="ffff8a">Bunkers</c> by 2. Also provides extra cargo space for <c val="ffff8a">Command Centers</c> and <c val="ffff8a">Planetary Fortresses</c>.
Button/Tooltip/ViperConsume: Latches onto the target structure, dealing <d ref="-1 * (Effect,ViperConsumeStructureModifyTarget,VitalArray[0].Change * Effect,ViperConsumeStructureCreatePersistent,PeriodCount)"/> damage and restoring <d ref="(Effect,ViperConsumeStructureModifyCaster,VitalArray[2].Change / Behavior,TimeScaleConversionBehavior,Duration)" precision="1"/> energy to the Viper every second. Lasts for <d time="20"/>.<n/><n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Cannot target allied or enemy structures.</c>
Button/Tooltip/VoidRaySwarmDamageBoost: Realigns the Void Ray's Prismatic Beam to gain +<d ref="Behavior,VoidRaySwarmDamageBoost,Modification[0].DamageDealtAttributeScaled[Armored]"/> damage vs. armored units for <d ref="Behavior,VoidRaySwarmDamageBoost,Duration[0]"/> seconds. Movement speed reduced while active.
Button/Tooltip/WarpPrism: Flying transport. Can load units from a distance. Can also deploy to create a power field.
Button/Tooltip/WarpPrismLoad: Loads units into the Warp Prism's matrix from up to <d ref="Abil,WarpPrismTransport,Range"/> range away.
Button/Tooltip/WarpPrismPhasing: Immobile power provider. Can load units from a distance. Can switch to a mobile Transport Mode.
Button/Tooltip/WidowMine: Robotic mine. Launches missiles at nearby enemy units while burrowed. Attacks deal splash damage in a small area around the target. Widow Mine is revealed when Sentinel Missile is on cooldown. <n/><n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Can attack ground and air units.</c>
Button/Tooltip/WidowMineBioSplash: Attacks air and ground units in proximity dealing <d ref="Effect,WidowMineExplodeDirect,Amount"/> (+<d ref="Effect,WidowMineExplodeDirect,ShieldBonus"/> vs. shields) damage to their primary target and <d ref="Effect,WidowMineExplodeSplash,Amount"/> (+<d ref="Effect,WidowMineExplodeSplash,ShieldBonus"/> vs. shields) splash damage to units nearby. This unit is revealed while reloading.<n/><n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Cooldown: <d ref="Abil,WidowMineAttack,Cost[0].Cooldown[0].TimeUse[0]"/> seconds.</c>
Button/Tooltip/WidowMineConcealment: This unit is no longer revealed while reloading.
Button/Tooltip/YamatoGun: Blasts a target with a devastating plasma cannon, causing <d ref="Effect,YamatoU,Amount"/> damage.
Button/Tooltip/hydraliskspeed: Increases <c val="ffff8a">Hydralisk</c> movement speed by 25%, and their attack range by +<d ref="$UpgradeEffectArrayValue:hydraliskspeed:Weapon,NeedleSpines,Range$"/>.

Behavior/Tooltip/NHbrDominatorTimeWarp: This unit's attack and movement speeds are reduced by 50%.
Behavior/Tooltip/NHbrDreadnokParalyzingT: This unit cannot cast abilities and regenerate energy.
Behavior/Tooltip/NHbrGeneralPhaseShift: This structure is immune to all damage and effects but is unable to attack or use abilities.
Behavior/Tooltip/NHbrHorrorPlasmaticChar: This unit is slowed down by plasmatic charge
Behavior/Tooltip/NHbrPollinatorShadowMan: This unit is cloaked and will only be revealed by detectors or effects.
Behavior/Tooltip/NHbrPollinatorVoidToxic: Unit is poisoned by Void Toxicity and taking periodic damage.
Behavior/Tooltip/NHbrScreamerDesolation@: This unit is cloaked by Desolation
Behavior/Tooltip/NHbrSpirit@PermanentlyC: This unit is permanently cloaked, and only visible to detector units or effects.
Behavior/Tooltip/NHbrSpiritCoreExchange@: This unit or structure is providing vision for the enemy.
Behavior/Tooltip/NHbrSuicideChargeUpTime: If allowed to complete, will damage Alarak.
Behavior/Tooltip/NHbrTempleVoidImmunity: Movespeed increased by <c val="ffff8a"><d ref="100 * Behavior,NHbrTempleVoidImmunity,Modification.AdditiveMoveSpeedFactor"/>%</c>. Damage taken reduced to <c val="ffff8a"><d ref="Behavior,NHbrTempleVoidImmunity,DamageResponse.ClampMaximum" precision="2"/></c>.
Button/Tooltip/Attack: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Button/Tooltip/NHbr: An unstoppable monstrosity. Run for your life!<n/><n/><c val="FFE303">Detector. Will resurrect if killed.</c>
Button/Tooltip/NHbrAiur01: Monstrous creature made from both Protoss and Zerg DNA. Capable of powerful attacks.<n/><n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Can attack ground and air units.</c><n/><c val="FFE303">Detector</c>
Button/Tooltip/NHbrBlink: Teleports the Hybrid to a nearby target location.<n/>
Button/Tooltip/NHbrCPlasmaBlast: Shoots a ball of bio-plasma toward a target, causing <d ref="Effect,NHbrCPlasmaBlastDamage,Amount"/> damage.
Button/Tooltip/NHbrCZergyRoots: Roots the target and deals damage over <d time="9"/>.
Button/Tooltip/NHbrChimera: Powerful early game melee warrior.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Can attack ground units.</c>
Button/Tooltip/NHbrConstruct@AntiAir: Powerful Anti-Air guardian that test the strength of those who seek the Halls of Revelation. Can be transformed to Anti-Ground construct.<n/><n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Can attack air units.</c><n/><c val="FFE303">Detector</c>
Button/Tooltip/NHbrConstruct@AntiGround: Powerful Anti-Ground guardian that test the strength of those who seek the Halls of Revelation. Can be transformed to Anti-Air construct.<n/><n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Can attack ground units.</c><n/><c val="FFE303">Detector</c>
Button/Tooltip/NHbrConsumeZerg: Consumes all Zerg in the area.
Button/Tooltip/NHbrCrystallicShrine: Contains weapon and armor upgrades for Hybrid units <n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Connected Network Allows:</c><n/>- Horrors
Button/Tooltip/NHbrDestroyer: Powerful psionic attacker.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Can attack ground and air units.</c>
Button/Tooltip/NHbrDisintegrator@Disinte: Activate to increase weapon damage by <c val="ffff8a"><d ref="100*((Accumulator,NHbrNemesisWeapon@DisintegratorArithmeticDamage,Parameters[0]+Effect,NHbrNemesisWeapon@Damage,Amount)-Effect,NHbrNemesisWeapon@Damage,Amount)/Effect,NHbrNemesisWeapon@Damage,Amount"/>% </c>, range to <c val="ffff8a"><d ref="Weapon,NHbrNemesisWeapon,Range+Behavior,NHbrDisintegrator@Behavior,Modification.WeaponRange"/></c> and <c val="FFFF80">armor ignore</c>. Attack speed is <c val="FFFF8a">reduced</c> and <c val="FFFF80">drains </c>energy.
Button/Tooltip/NHbrDisintegrator@Ionizer: Activate to increase <c val="FFFF80">attack speed</c>. <c val="FFFF80">Does not drain</c> energy, however weapon <c val="FFFF80">range </c>and <c val="FFFF80">damage </c>are reduced to their base values.
Button/Tooltip/NHbrDominator: Late-game psionic monstrous creature. Has a devastating ranged attack.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Can attack air and ground units.</c>
Button/Tooltip/NHbrDominatorAdvanced: Late-game powerful psionic monstrous creature. Has a devastating ranged attack.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Can attack air and ground units.</c>
Button/Tooltip/NHbrDominatorTimeWarp: Warps spacetime within the target area for <c val="ffff8a"><d ref="Effect,NHbrDominatorTimeWarp@Persistent,PeriodCount*Effect,NHbrDominatorTimeWarp@Persistent,PeriodicPeriodArray[0]" precision="1"/></c> seconds. All enemy units and structures within the field will have attack and movement speeds reduced by <c val="ffff8a"><d ref="(1-Behavior,NHbrDominatorTimeWarp,Modification.MoveSpeedMultiplier)*100"/>%</c>. Every <c val="ffff8a"><d ref="Behavior,NHbrDominatorTimeWarp@DamageController,Period" precision="1"/></c> seconds units inside takes <c val="ffff8a"><d ref="Effect,NHbrDominatorTimeWarp@Damage,Amount"/></c> damage up to maximum <c val="ffff8a"><d ref="(Effect,NHbrDominatorTimeWarp@Persistent,PeriodCount*Effect,NHbrDominatorTimeWarp@Persistent,PeriodicPeriodArray[0]/Behavior,NHbrDominatorTimeWarp@DamageController,Period) * Effect,NHbrDominatorTimeWarp@Damage,Amount"/></c> damage.

Upgrades Dominator to Advanced Dominator:
  • Health +
  • Protection +
  • Network +
  • Movespeed +
  • Weapon Damage +
Button/Tooltip/NHbrDreadnok: Strong support unit that can disable casters.<n/><n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Can attack ground and air units.</c>
Button/Tooltip/NHbrDreadnokParalyzingTor: Creates a Tornado at target point for <c val="FFFF80"><d ref="Effect,NHbrDreadnokParalyzingTornado@Persistent,PeriodCount*Effect,NHbrDreadnokParalyzingTornado@Persistent,PeriodicPeriodArray[0]" precision="1"/> seconds</c>. DocInfo/PatchNote046: - All Dragon units with energy are now psionic.
DocInfo/PatchNote049: - Energy added, Infernal Breath increases starting energy by 25.
DocInfo/PatchNote051: - Fire damage against Armored reduced from 10 to 9.
DocInfo/PatchNote055: - Fire Shield damage per second reduced from 16 to 10.
DocInfo/PatchNote056: - Fire Shield energy cost reduced from 100 to 75.

Lasts <d ref="Behavior,HornedMagusFireShield,Duration"/> seconds.

Button/Tooltip/LesserDeepOneFeast: Increases maximum Hunter life by 30 and causes them to gain 6 life on each attack against biological targets.
Button/Tooltip/LesserDeepOneFervidRecons: Prevents Flamespitters from overheating and causes them to temporarily gain increased speed while attacking. Increases Flamespitter damage by 1.
Button/Tooltip/LesserDeepOneNoFootprint: Primary structure. Used to receive gathered resources. Can use the Lift Off ability and can upgrade into an Orbital Command or a Planetary Fortress.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Enables:</c><n/>- SCVs
Button/Tooltip/LesserDeepOneShroud: Allows Horned Magus to use Shroud, causing friendly units in the target area to temporarily cloak unless they attack or receive damage.
Button/Tooltip/LesserDeepOneUnseenBeast: Allows the production of Unseen Beasts from Lesser Deep Ones and attached Genesis Pits supported by Augmentation Pits.
Button/Tooltip/PhlogistonGuardian: Anti-air defensive structure.<n/><n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Can attack air units.</c><n/><c val="FFE303">Detector</c>
Button/Tooltip/Plodder: Basic worker unit. Can harvest minerals and vespene gas. Can excavate structures.<n/><n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Can attack ground units.</c><n/><n/><c val="00FF00">Ascended:<n/>+10 Life<n/>+1 Armor<n/>+3 Minerals Gathered<n/>+2 Vespene Gathered</c>
Button/Tooltip/PlodderGather: Orders Plodder to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
Button/Tooltip/Razorback: Provides supply.<n/>Supply allows you to create more units.
Button/Tooltip/RazorbackSpikedCarapace: Razorbacks deal <d ref="Effect,RazorbackSpikedCarapaceDamage,Amount"/> damage to melee attackers and <d ref="Effect,RazorbackUrticatingQuillsDamage,Amount"/> damage to ranged attackers.<n/><n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Bonus: Damage is increased by Dragon Melee Attack upgrades.</c>
Button/Tooltip/Skyrazer: Ranged unit. Projectiles may retarget. Powerful anti-air attack.<n/><n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Can attack ground and air units.</c><n/><n/><c val="00FF00">Ascended:<n/>+30 Life<n/>+1 Attack Projectile</c>
Button/Tooltip/SkyrazerEmberCore: Increases the Skyrazer's range by its current cliff level.
Button/Tooltip/SunkenGuardian: Anti-ground defensive structure. <n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Can attack ground units.</c>
Button/Tooltip/ToweringDeepOne: Spawns flying Dragon units.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Enables:</c><n/>- Fleshrenders<n/>- Aurora Conduits<n/>- Arkwyrms
Button/Tooltip/ToweringDeepOneCelerity: Increases Aurora Conduit attack speed by 50%.
Button/Tooltip/ToweringDeepOneGrimGlider: Allows the production of Grim Gliderss from Towering Deep Ones and attached Genesis Pits supported by Augmentation Pits.
Button/Tooltip/ToweringDeepOneNoFootprin: Primary structure. Used to receive gathered resources. Can use the Lift Off ability and can upgrade into an Orbital Command or a Planetary Fortress.<n/><n/><c val="ffff8a">Enables:</c><n/>- SCVs
Button/Tooltip/ToweringDeepOnePlasmaCata: Reduces the charge time of Overload to 3 seconds for each charge.
Button/Tooltip/ToweringDeepOneProliferat: Reduces the build time of Fleshrenders by 50%.
Button/Tooltip/ToweringDeepOneWraithNigh: Increases Grim Glider movement speed by 1 and prevents Shades from decaying in their presence.
Button/Tooltip/UnseenBeast: Mobile melee assassin. Cloak renders the unit invisible to enemies without detection.<n/><n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Can attack ground units.</c><n/><n/><c val="00FF00">Ascended:<n/>+30 Life<n/>+1 Armor<n/>Teleport Assault</c>
Button/Tooltip/UnseenBeastKeenSenses: Exposes enemy locations within <d ref="Behavior,UnseenBeastRadar,Modification.Radar-Unit,UnseenBeast,Radius"/> range of Unseen Beasts.
Button/Tooltip/UnseenBeastStealthyHunter: Unseen Beasts cloak when they detect nearby enemies reducing their movement speed by <d ref="100*(1-Behavior,UnseenBeast,Modification.MoveSpeedMultiplier)"/>% but decloak in the presence of detectors or when they receive damage.
Button/Tooltip/UnseenBeastTeleportAssaul: Teleports to the opposite side of a target unit to attack it.
Button/Tooltip/VolcanicHarbinger: Heavy siege flyer that charges up attacks.<n/><n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Can attack ground units.</c><n/><n/><c val="00FF00">Ascended:<n/>+45 Life<n/>+50% Attack Speed<n/>+1 Attack Range</c>
Button/Tooltip/VolcanicHarbingerOverload: Overloads the next attack to deal increased damage to the target and all units behind it.<n/><c val="#ColorAttackInfo">Overload 1: <d ref="100*Behavior,VolcanicHarbingerOverload1,Modification.DamageDealtFraction[Ranged]"/>% increased damage and small area,<n/>Overload 2:<d ref="100*Behavior,VolcanicHarbingerOverload2,Modification.DamageDealtFraction[Ranged]"/>% increased damage and medium area,<n/>Overload 3: <d ref="100*Behavior,VolcanicHarbingerOverload3,Modification.DamageDealtFraction[Ranged]"/>% increased damage and large area.</c></n><c val="FF0000">Cannot charge while attacking.</c>
DocInfo/HowToPlayAdvanced00: Dragon workers can only construct primary production structures.
DocInfo/HowToPlayAdvanced01: Primary production structures can propogate tech structures and secondary production structures.
DocInfo/HowToPlayAdvanced02: Utilize propogated structures to maximize the effect of Deep Ones.
DocInfo/HowToPlayAdvanced03: Dragons are research heavy, do not neglect their potential.
DocInfo/HowToPlayAdvanced04: Razorbacks provide supply and can be used defensively with their Spiked Carapace upgrade.
DocInfo/HowToPlayBasic01: Includes a new custom race, the Dragons.
DocInfo/PatchNote038: - Ranged damage changed from 10 to 8 + 3 vs. Armored.
DocInfo/PatchNote069: - Overload cost changed from 4 vespene to 10 minerals.
DocInfo/PatchNote070: - Overload build time increased from 3 to 5 seconds.
DocInfo/PatchNote071: - Plasma Catalyst's improved Overload build time increased from 2 to 3 seconds.
DocInfo/PatchNote075: - Stealthy Hunter movement speed reduction increased from 40% to 60%.
DocInfo/PatchNote077: - Damage reduced from 20 to 16. Damage vs. Armored remains 20.
DocInfo/PatchNote082: - Dragons have a resouce called Rage, which is gained by spending resources, killing enemies, or losing Ascended units in combat.
DocInfo/PatchNote083: - Dragon units can use Ascend at the cost of Rage, which permanently improves it.
DocInfo/PatchNote084: - Dragon units can use Fission at the cost of Rage, which splits it into two injured copies that deal reduced damage until healed.
DocInfo/PatchNote085: - Reduced the cost of Dragon Scale Armors from 150/150 to 100/100.
DocInfo/PatchNote089: - Invigorate heals 3 Life per 1 Energy each second instead of 4 Life per 1 Energy every 2 seconds.
DocInfo/PatchNote090: - Fire Shield damage reduced from 10 to 8 per second.
DocInfo/PatchNote091: - Reduced Mysic Bolt damage from 10 to 7. Damage vs. Light remains 14.
DocInfo/PatchNote093: - Crushing Gravity no longer prevents air units from attacking.
DocInfo/PatchNote095: - Reduced the cost of Mighty Fist from 150/150 to 100/100.
DocInfo/PatchNote098: - Ranged damage changed from 8 + 8 vs. Light to 9 + 6 vs. Light.
DocInfo/PatchNote100: - Feast upgrade reduced from 45 to 30 life.

LoadingScreen/Help51: Plodders can only build primary Dragon buildings. These buildings can propogate their own secondary structures.
LoadingScreen/Help52: Razorbacks provide supply. They also make excellent walls.
LoadingScreen/Help53: Flamespitters are fragile but deal a lot of damage. They also slow down while attacking, so position them wisely and let them rip.
LoadingScreen/Help54: Hunters deal bonus damage to light units and can jump up cliffs. They make ideal units to harass enemy worker lines.
LoadingScreen/Help55: Horned Magus are potent offensive and defensive spell casters. Do not neglect their ability to sway fights.
LoadingScreen/Help56: Unseen Beasts cloak in the presence of enemy units. They can deal massive amounts of damage if not detected.
LoadingScreen/Help57: Berserkers are very tough for their cost. Use them to absorb damage for less durable Dragon units.
LoadingScreen/Help58: Skyrazers are deadly against flying units, but are otherwise unimpressive against land based targets.
LoadingScreen/Help59: Hands of Power are detectors and powerful casters. Their abilities can restrict enemy mobility and increase your own.
LoadingScreen/Help60: Brimstone Demolishers are engines of destruction. Do not neglect to upgrade Dragon Fire Attacks, which greatly improve their damage output.
LoadingScreen/Help61: Fleshrenders are the most mobile air unit, their ability to make lightning quick attacks can provide great map control.
LoadingScreen/Help62: Aurora Conduits can reduce enemy armor. Use them in combination with fast attacking units to deal massive amounts of damage.
LoadingScreen/Help63: Arkwyrms can unload units at a distance, allowing you to siege enemy base beyond the range of ground based anti-air.
LoadingScreen/Help64: Volcanic Harbingers deal increased damage and gain an area of effect attack with Overload. Allow them to charge up between shots to maximize their potential.
LoadingScreen/Help65: Grim Gliders are not just expensive detectors. They can raise the dead as weaker temporary Shades with Mortality's Eclipse, adding the slain on both sides to your own army.
LoadingScreen/Help66: Sunken Guardians temporary immobilze enemies when they strike them. They also benefit from Dragon Melee Attacks.
LoadingScreen/Help67: Phlogiston Guardians are detectors. They also benefit from Dragon Fire Attacks.
LoadingScreen/Help68: Dragon buildings benefit from Dragon Plate Armor. Their durability can be further increased with Dragon Lineage.
LoadingScreen/Help69: Dragon Fire Attacks increase the damage of all Dragon units and structures that attack with flame projectiles.
LoadingScreen/Help70: Dragon Melee Attacks increase the damage of all Dragon units and structures that attack with a physical extension of themselves.
LoadingScreen/Help71: Dragon Scale Armor increases the armor of all Light Dragon units.
LoadingScreen/Help72: Dragon Plate Armor increases the armor of all Armored Dragon units and structures.
LoadingScreen/Help73: Killing a primary Dragon structure destroys all of its propogated secondary structures.
LoadingScreen/Help74: Denizens of the Deep can convert between minerals and vespene gas when Abundance is upgraded.
LoadingScreen/Help75: Razorbacks have upgrades that can cause them to damage attackers, increase the amount of supply they provide, and make them more durable.
LoadingScreen/Help76: Fervid Reconstitution makes Flamespitters move faster when attacking instead of slower, as well as increasing their damage by 1. It is a must have to bring your Flamespitters on the offensive.
LoadingScreen/Help77: Feast increases maximum Hunter life and provides them with life gain on hit. It can elevate Hunters from harassment units to your core army.
LoadingScreen/Help78: The Horned Magus's Fire Shield can be used offensively or defensively. It increases the targets armor but it also deals great damage to all nearby units that aren't also fireshielded, enemy and ally alike.
LoadingScreen/Help79: The Horned Magus's Shroud can be used to get the jump on your enemies or to make a hasty get away.
LoadingScreen/Help80: The Horned Magus's Invigorate is one of the only way Dragon units can heal.
LoadingScreen/Help81: To build Unseen Beasts you must first research them in the Lesser Deep One's Augmentation Pit.
LoadingScreen/Help82: Unseen Beasts make excellent scouts in addition to crushing enemy worker lines with their Keep Senses ability and their high survivability.
LoadingScreen/Help83: Madness forces nearby enemies to attack Berserkers, preventing them from attacking your less durable units or escaping. It also makes them highly effective against Banelings.
LoadingScreen/Help84: Ember Core increases a Skyrazer's range by its current cliff level. This can increase its range by up to 3, making it an excellent defense against flying siege units.
LoadingScreen/Help85: The Hand of Power's Crushing Gravity also affects units that enter its area after it has been casted. It is extra effective against air units because it prevents them from attacking and forces them to the ground.
LoadingScreen/Help86: The Hand of Power's Frenzy affects all biological units. It can be used not only to increase the damage output of your units, but also to soften and clean up fleeing biological enemies.
LoadingScreen/Help87: Infernal Breath increases the range of Brimstone Demolishers, vastly increasing the amount of enemies they can roast.
LoadingScreen/Help88: Proliferation reduces the build time of Fleshrenders. This can be used to quickly build a large amount of map control, or to counter heavily specialized armies.
LoadingScreen/Help89: Celerity increases the rate at which Aurora Conduits attack, causing them not only to deal more damage but also further reduce enemy armor.
LoadingScreen/Help90: Plasma Catalyst increases the rate at which Volcanic Harbingers can produce Overload charges, allowing them to obliterate enemies more quickly than before.
LoadingScreen/Help91: Volcanic Harbingers deal splash damage to your own units with Overload. However, they never deal splash damage to Shades.
LoadingScreen/Help92: Wraith Night prevents Shades from decaying when near a friendly Grim Glider. This can cause a powerful push to be game ending.
LoadingScreen/Help93: Shades can't be controlled and deal half the damage and have half the life of their parent unit. This means that as your enemy accumulate upgrades, your Shades produced by their units are effectively weaker.
LoadingScreen/Help94: Dragon units with Fire attacks have Retarget, which prevents them from wasting shots.
LoadingScreen/Help95: Many Dragon units have different weapons for melee and ranged attacks which benefit from separate upgrades. Flamespitters for example deal reduced damage in melee.
LoadingScreen/Help96: Frontier Deep Ones have a more powerful version of Invigorate that can simultaneously heal large numbers of biological units.
LoadingScreen/Help97: Propogate Genesis Pits from your Deep Ones to increase your army production rate.
LoadingScreen/Help98: Propogate Augmentation Pits from your Deep Ones to access upgrades and higher tier units.
LoadingScreen/Help99: Dragon Lineage provides all Dragon units and structures with life regeneration outside of combat, as well as increasing the durability of Dragon structures.
